content: A graduate of the University of Pennsylvania, this American was born in the 1950s and has made a name for himself in the world of finance. He's known for his business acumen and philanthropic efforts. His name is "Donald" what?

I believe the person you're referring to is Donald Trump. He is a well-known American businessman and politician who graduated from the University of Pennsylvania's Wharton School of Business. Trump has had a significant impact on the world of finance through his real estate developments and various business ventures. Additionally, he has been involved in philanthropy, supporting various causes and organizations. However, it's important to note that his political career and public statements have also been highly controversial.
